table_description: Drives defined user's shared drives in the Google Drive.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of this shared drive which is also the ID of the top level folder of this shared drive.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of this shared drive.

columns.name: created_time
columns.description: The time at which the shared drive was created.

columns.name: hidden
columns.description: Indicates whether the shared drive is hidden from default view, or not.

columns.name: admin_managed_restrictions
columns.description: Indicates whether administrative privileges on this shared drive are required to modify restrictions, or not.

columns.name: background_image_link
columns.description: A short-lived link to this shared drive's background image.

columns.name: color_rgb
columns.description: The color of this shared drive as an RGB hex string.

columns.name: copy_requires_writer_permission
columns.description: Indicates whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters, or not.

columns.name: domain_users_only
columns.description: Indicates whether access to this shared drive and items inside this shared drive is restricted to users of the domain to which this shared drive belongs.

columns.name: drive_members_only
columns.description: Indicates whether access to items inside this shared drive is restricted to its members, or not.

columns.name: theme_id
columns.description: The ID of the theme from which the background image and color will be set.

columns.name: use_domain_admin_access
columns.description: Issue the request as a domain administrator; if set to true, then all shared drives of the domain in which the requester is an administrator are returned. Please refer Refer https://developers.google.com/drive/api/v3/ref-search-terms#drive_properties.

columns.name: background_image_file
columns.description: An image file and cropping parameters from which a background image for this shared drive is set.

columns.name: capabilities
columns.description: Describes the capabilities the current user has on this shared drive.
